channel.title: Delvin Deep
channel.itunes:subtitle: with Alex and Richard
channel.itunes:author: Delvin Deep
channel.itunes:summary: Conversations and banter on history, society, sports, politics, current events, science, music, etc...Join us!
channel.description: Conversations and banter on history, society, sports, politics, current events, science, music, etc...Join us!
channel.itunes:keywords: history, politics, sports, current events, news, diplomacy, science, technology, lifestyle, culture

item.itunes:title: EP-7: Vacation on Mars?
item.title: EP-7: Vacation on Mars?
item.description: Innovations in space exploration is at an all time high! We discuss cool new ideas, companies, and their future plans. Plus Alex and Richard debate whether it's a good idea to vacation on the moon. https://twitter.com/delvinPod
item.content:encoded:
Innovations in space exploration is at an all time high! We discuss cool new ideas, companies, and their future plans. Plus Alex and Richard debate whether it's a good idea to vacation on the moon.

Support the show https://twitter.com/delvinPod
item.itunes:author: Delvin Deep
item.itunes:summary: Innovations in space exploration is at an all time high! We discuss cool new ideas, companies, and their future plans. Plus Alex and Richard debate whether it's a good idea to vacation on the moon.
